main_hero.name: Quantum Guardian
main_hero.origin_story: Gained powers during quantum experiment accident that opened rifts between dimensions

powers.name: Quantum Manipulation
powers.description: Control over quantum particles and probability fields
powers.visual_effect: blue energy with swirling particle effects
powers.limitations: Requires intense concentration, drains mental energy

powers.name: Phase Shifting
powers.description: Can become intangible or shift between dimensions
powers.limitations: Cannot phase while exhausted or emotionally unstable

costume.material: quantum-reactive fabric that responds to her powers

personality.motivation: Protect innocent people from quantum threats and dimensional incursions

supporting_characters.name: Marcus Steel
supporting_characters.background: Former colleague who helps design her equipment

villains.name: Entropy Master
villains.motivation: Believes universe should return to primordial chaos
villains.connection_to_hero: Former research partner who was corrupted by dark dimension

villains.name: The Void Collective
villains.motivation: Consume all realities to feed their hunger

episodes.title: Origin of Power
episodes.description: Sarah gains her quantum abilities in a lab accident

episodes.title: First Mission
episodes.description: Sarah's first attempt at heroism goes awry
key_scenes: Inexperienced use of powers causes problems
Learning to control abilities under pressure

episodes.title: The Entropy Master Rises
episodes.description: Sarah faces her first major villain
key_scenes: Philosophical debate about order vs chaos

quantum_physics_rules: Quantum fields can be manipulated by trained minds
Dimensional barriers are weakening due to experiments
Probability can be influenced but not controlled

organizations.name: Quantum Research Institute
organizations.purpose: Study quantum phenomena and develop technology

locations.name: New Arcadia City
locations.description: Futuristic metropolis with quantum technology integration

locations.name: The Quantum Lab
locations.description: Sarah's secret base with dimensional monitoring equipment

locations.name: The Void Realm
locations.description: Dark dimension where the Void Collective originates
